articles.title: Asian shares on edge as U.S. bond yields rise, oil volatile - Reuters
articles.description: Share markets were jittery in early Asia on Wednesday as trading was buffeted by a step-up in U.S. Treasury yields as well as volatile oil prices in the face of price-cooling moves by the United States and other nations.

articles.title: SIA apologises for confusion over e-mail on Covid-19 quarantine requirements in Malaysia - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): Singapore Airlines (SIA) has apologised for any confusion caused after an e-mail regarding changes to Covid-19 travel measures in Malaysia was sent to passengers.

articles.title: PBC eyes SEA Games gold — Bong Coo - BusinessWorld Online
articles.description: INSPIRED by its bronze medal performance in the World Championships in Dubai, the Philippine bowling team has trained its sights at claiming its first Southeast Asian (SEA) Games gold medal in over a decade in the Hanoi tilt in May next year.

articles.title: Bargain hunting propels market past 7,400 mark - Philstar.com
